deprecated.description: These rules have been deprecated in accordance with the deprecation policy, and replaced by newer rules:
deprecated.name: Deprecated

removed.description: These rules from older versions of ESLint (before the deprecation policy existed) have been replaced by newer rules:
removed.name: Removed

types.description: These rules relate to possible logic errors in code:
types.name: problem

rules.description: enforce `return` statements in callbacks of array methods
rules.name: array-callback-return

rules.description: require `super()` calls in constructors
rules.name: constructor-super

rules.description: enforce "for" loop update clause moving the counter in the right direction.
rules.name: for-direction

rules.description: enforce `return` statements in getters
rules.name: getter-return

rules.description: disallow using an async function as a Promise executor
rules.name: no-async-promise-executor

rules.description: disallow `await` inside of loops
rules.name: no-await-in-loop

rules.description: disallow reassigning class members
rules.name: no-class-assign

rules.description: disallow comparing against -0
rules.name: no-compare-neg-zero

rules.description: disallow assignment operators in conditional expressions
rules.name: no-cond-assign

rules.description: disallow reassigning `const` variables
rules.name: no-const-assign

rules.description: disallow constant expressions in conditions
rules.name: no-constant-condition

rules.description: disallow returning value from constructor
rules.name: no-constructor-return

rules.description: disallow control characters in regular expressions
rules.name: no-control-regex

rules.description: disallow the use of `debugger`
rules.name: no-debugger

rules.description: disallow duplicate arguments in `function` definitions
rules.name: no-dupe-args

rules.description: disallow duplicate class members
rules.name: no-dupe-class-members

rules.description: disallow duplicate conditions in if-else-if chains
rules.name: no-dupe-else-if

rules.description: disallow duplicate keys in object literals
rules.name: no-dupe-keys

rules.description: disallow duplicate case labels
rules.name: no-duplicate-case

rules.description: disallow duplicate module imports
rules.name: no-duplicate-imports

rules.description: disallow empty character classes in regular expressions
rules.name: no-empty-character-class

rules.description: disallow empty destructuring patterns
rules.name: no-empty-pattern

rules.description: disallow reassigning exceptions in `catch` clauses
rules.name: no-ex-assign

rules.description: disallow fallthrough of `case` statements
rules.name: no-fallthrough

rules.description: disallow reassigning `function` declarations
rules.name: no-func-assign

rules.description: disallow assigning to imported bindings
rules.name: no-import-assign

rules.description: disallow variable or `function` declarations in nested blocks
rules.name: no-inner-declarations

rules.description: disallow invalid regular expression strings in `RegExp` constructors
rules.name: no-invalid-regexp

rules.description: disallow irregular whitespace
rules.name: no-irregular-whitespace

rules.description: disallow literal numbers that lose precision
rules.name: no-loss-of-precision

rules.description: disallow characters which are made with multiple code points in character class syntax
rules.name: no-misleading-character-class

rules.description: disallow `new` operators with the `Symbol` object
rules.name: no-new-symbol

rules.description: disallow calling global object properties as functions
rules.name: no-obj-calls

rules.description: disallow returning values from Promise executor functions
rules.name: no-promise-executor-return

rules.description: disallow calling some `Object.prototype` methods directly on objects
rules.name: no-prototype-builtins

rules.description: disallow assignments where both sides are exactly the same
rules.name: no-self-assign

rules.description: disallow comparisons where both sides are exactly the same
rules.name: no-self-compare

rules.description: disallow returning values from setters
rules.name: no-setter-return

rules.description: disallow sparse arrays
rules.name: no-sparse-arrays

rules.description: disallow template literal placeholder syntax in regular strings
rules.name: no-template-curly-in-string

rules.description: disallow `this`/`super` before calling `super()` in constructors
rules.name: no-this-before-super

rules.description: disallow the use of undeclared variables unless mentioned in `/*global */` comments
rules.name: no-undef

rules.description: disallow confusing multiline expressions
rules.name: no-unexpected-multiline

rules.description: disallow unmodified loop conditions
rules.name: no-unmodified-loop-condition

rules.description: disallow unreachable code after `return`, `throw`, `continue`, and `break` statements
rules.name: no-unreachable

rules.description: disallow loops with a body that allows only one iteration
rules.name: no-unreachable-loop

rules.description: disallow control flow statements in `finally` blocks
rules.name: no-unsafe-finally

rules.description: disallow negating the left operand of relational operators
rules.name: no-unsafe-negation

rules.description: disallow use of optional chaining in contexts where the `undefined` value is not allowed
rules.name: no-unsafe-optional-chaining

rules.description: disallow unused private class members
rules.name: no-unused-private-class-members

rules.description: disallow unused variables
rules.name: no-unused-vars

rules.description: disallow the use of variables before they are defined
rules.name: no-use-before-define

rules.description: disallow useless backreferences in regular expressions
rules.name: no-useless-backreference

rules.description: disallow assignments that can lead to race conditions due to usage of `await` or `yield`
rules.name: require-atomic-updates

rules.description: require calls to `isNaN()` when checking for `NaN`
rules.name: use-isnan

rules.description: enforce comparing `typeof` expressions against valid strings
rules.name: valid-typeof

types.description: These rules suggest alternate ways of doing things:
types.name: suggestion

rules.description: enforce getter and setter pairs in objects and classes
rules.name: accessor-pairs

rules.description: require braces around arrow function bodies
rules.name: arrow-body-style

rules.description: enforce the use of variables within the scope they are defined
rules.name: block-scoped-var

rules.description: enforce camelcase naming convention
rules.name: camelcase

rules.description: enforce or disallow capitalization of the first letter of a comment
rules.name: capitalized-comments

rules.description: enforce that class methods utilize `this`
rules.name: class-methods-use-this

rules.description: enforce a maximum cyclomatic complexity allowed in a program
rules.name: complexity

rules.description: require `return` statements to either always or never specify values
rules.name: consistent-return

rules.description: enforce consistent naming when capturing the current execution context
rules.name: consistent-this

rules.description: enforce consistent brace style for all control statements
rules.name: curly

rules.description: require `default` cases in `switch` statements
rules.name: default-case

rules.description: enforce default clauses in switch statements to be last
rules.name: default-case-last

rules.description: enforce default parameters to be last
rules.name: default-param-last

rules.description: enforce dot notation whenever possible
rules.name: dot-notation

rules.description: require the use of `===` and `!==`
rules.name: eqeqeq

rules.description: require function names to match the name of the variable or property to which they are assigned
rules.name: func-name-matching

rules.description: require or disallow named `function` expressions
rules.name: func-names

rules.description: enforce the consistent use of either `function` declarations or expressions
rules.name: func-style

rules.description: require grouped accessor pairs in object literals and classes
rules.name: grouped-accessor-pairs

rules.description: require `for-in` loops to include an `if` statement
rules.name: guard-for-in

rules.description: disallow specified identifiers
rules.name: id-denylist

rules.description: enforce minimum and maximum identifier lengths
rules.name: id-length

rules.description: require identifiers to match a specified regular expression
rules.name: id-match

rules.description: require or disallow initialization in variable declarations
rules.name: init-declarations

rules.description: enforce a maximum number of classes per file
rules.name: max-classes-per-file

rules.description: enforce a maximum depth that blocks can be nested
rules.name: max-depth

rules.description: enforce a maximum number of lines per file
rules.name: max-lines

rules.description: enforce a maximum number of lines of code in a function
rules.name: max-lines-per-function

rules.description: enforce a maximum depth that callbacks can be nested
rules.name: max-nested-callbacks

rules.description: enforce a maximum number of parameters in function definitions
rules.name: max-params

rules.description: enforce a maximum number of statements allowed in function blocks
rules.name: max-statements

rules.description: enforce a particular style for multiline comments
rules.name: multiline-comment-style

rules.description: require constructor names to begin with a capital letter
rules.name: new-cap

rules.description: disallow the use of `alert`, `confirm`, and `prompt`
rules.name: no-alert

rules.description: disallow `Array` constructors
rules.name: no-array-constructor

rules.description: disallow bitwise operators
rules.name: no-bitwise

rules.description: disallow the use of `arguments.caller` or `arguments.callee`
rules.name: no-caller

rules.description: disallow lexical declarations in case clauses
rules.name: no-case-declarations

rules.description: disallow arrow functions where they could be confused with comparisons
rules.name: no-confusing-arrow

rules.description: disallow the use of `console`
rules.name: no-console

rules.description: disallow `continue` statements
rules.name: no-continue

rules.description: disallow deleting variables
rules.name: no-delete-var

rules.description: disallow division operators explicitly at the beginning of regular expressions
rules.name: no-div-regex

rules.description: disallow `else` blocks after `return` statements in `if` statements
rules.name: no-else-return

rules.description: disallow empty block statements
rules.name: no-empty

rules.description: disallow empty functions
rules.name: no-empty-function

rules.description: disallow `null` comparisons without type-checking operators
rules.name: no-eq-null

rules.description: disallow the use of `eval()`
rules.name: no-eval

rules.description: disallow extending native types
rules.name: no-extend-native

rules.description: disallow unnecessary calls to `.bind()`
rules.name: no-extra-bind

rules.description: disallow unnecessary boolean casts
rules.name: no-extra-boolean-cast

rules.description: disallow unnecessary labels
rules.name: no-extra-label

rules.description: disallow unnecessary semicolons
rules.name: no-extra-semi

rules.description: disallow leading or trailing decimal points in numeric literals
rules.name: no-floating-decimal

rules.description: disallow assignments to native objects or read-only global variables
rules.name: no-global-assign

rules.description: disallow shorthand type conversions
rules.name: no-implicit-coercion

rules.description: disallow declarations in the global scope
rules.name: no-implicit-globals

rules.description: disallow the use of `eval()`-like methods
rules.name: no-implied-eval

rules.description: disallow inline comments after code
rules.name: no-inline-comments

rules.description: disallow `this` keywords outside of classes or class-like objects
rules.name: no-invalid-this

rules.description: disallow the use of the `__iterator__` property
rules.name: no-iterator

rules.description: disallow labels that share a name with a variable
rules.name: no-label-var

rules.description: disallow labeled statements
rules.name: no-labels

rules.description: disallow unnecessary nested blocks
rules.name: no-lone-blocks

rules.description: disallow `if` statements as the only statement in `else` blocks
rules.name: no-lonely-if

rules.description: disallow function declarations that contain unsafe references inside loop statements
rules.name: no-loop-func

rules.description: disallow magic numbers
rules.name: no-magic-numbers

rules.description: disallow mixed binary operators
rules.name: no-mixed-operators

rules.description: disallow use of chained assignment expressions
rules.name: no-multi-assign

rules.description: disallow multiline strings
rules.name: no-multi-str

rules.description: disallow negated conditions
rules.name: no-negated-condition

rules.description: disallow nested ternary expressions
rules.name: no-nested-ternary

rules.description: disallow `new` operators outside of assignments or comparisons
rules.name: no-new

rules.description: disallow `new` operators with the `Function` object
rules.name: no-new-func

rules.description: disallow `Object` constructors
rules.name: no-new-object

rules.description: disallow `new` operators with the `String`, `Number`, and `Boolean` objects
rules.name: no-new-wrappers

rules.description: disallow `\8` and `\9` escape sequences in string literals
rules.name: no-nonoctal-decimal-escape

rules.description: disallow octal literals
rules.name: no-octal

rules.description: disallow octal escape sequences in string literals
rules.name: no-octal-escape

rules.description: disallow reassigning `function` parameters
rules.name: no-param-reassign

rules.description: disallow the unary operators `++` and `--`
rules.name: no-plusplus

rules.description: disallow the use of the `__proto__` property
rules.name: no-proto

rules.description: disallow variable redeclaration
rules.name: no-redeclare

rules.description: disallow multiple spaces in regular expressions
rules.name: no-regex-spaces

rules.description: disallow specified names in exports
rules.name: no-restricted-exports

rules.description: disallow specified global variables
rules.name: no-restricted-globals

rules.description: disallow specified modules when loaded by `import`
rules.name: no-restricted-imports

rules.description: disallow certain properties on certain objects
rules.name: no-restricted-properties

rules.description: disallow specified syntax
rules.name: no-restricted-syntax

rules.description: disallow assignment operators in `return` statements
rules.name: no-return-assign

rules.description: disallow unnecessary `return await`
rules.name: no-return-await

rules.description: disallow `javascript:` urls
rules.name: no-script-url

rules.description: disallow comma operators
rules.name: no-sequences

rules.description: disallow variable declarations from shadowing variables declared in the outer scope
rules.name: no-shadow

rules.description: disallow identifiers from shadowing restricted names
rules.name: no-shadow-restricted-names

rules.description: disallow ternary operators
rules.name: no-ternary

rules.description: disallow throwing literals as exceptions
rules.name: no-throw-literal

rules.description: disallow initializing variables to `undefined`
rules.name: no-undef-init

rules.description: disallow the use of `undefined` as an identifier
rules.name: no-undefined

rules.description: disallow dangling underscores in identifiers
rules.name: no-underscore-dangle

rules.description: disallow ternary operators when simpler alternatives exist
rules.name: no-unneeded-ternary

rules.description: disallow unused expressions
rules.name: no-unused-expressions

rules.description: disallow unused labels
rules.name: no-unused-labels

rules.description: disallow unnecessary calls to `.call()` and `.apply()`
rules.name: no-useless-call

rules.description: disallow unnecessary `catch` clauses
rules.name: no-useless-catch

rules.description: disallow unnecessary computed property keys in objects and classes
rules.name: no-useless-computed-key

rules.description: disallow unnecessary concatenation of literals or template literals
rules.name: no-useless-concat

rules.description: disallow unnecessary constructors
rules.name: no-useless-constructor

rules.description: disallow unnecessary escape characters
rules.name: no-useless-escape

rules.description: disallow renaming import, export, and destructured assignments to the same name
rules.name: no-useless-rename

rules.description: disallow redundant return statements
rules.name: no-useless-return

rules.description: require `let` or `const` instead of `var`
rules.name: no-var

rules.description: disallow `void` operators
rules.name: no-void

rules.description: disallow specified warning terms in comments
rules.name: no-warning-comments

rules.description: disallow `with` statements
rules.name: no-with

rules.description: require or disallow method and property shorthand syntax for object literals
rules.name: object-shorthand

rules.description: enforce variables to be declared either together or separately in functions
rules.name: one-var

rules.description: require or disallow newlines around variable declarations
rules.name: one-var-declaration-per-line

rules.description: require or disallow assignment operator shorthand where possible
rules.name: operator-assignment

rules.description: require using arrow functions for callbacks
rules.name: prefer-arrow-callback

rules.description: require `const` declarations for variables that are never reassigned after declared
rules.name: prefer-const

rules.description: require destructuring from arrays and/or objects
rules.name: prefer-destructuring

rules.description: disallow the use of `Math.pow` in favor of the `**` operator
rules.name: prefer-exponentiation-operator

rules.description: enforce using named capture group in regular expression
rules.name: prefer-named-capture-group

rules.description: disallow `parseInt()` and `Number.parseInt()` in favor of binary, octal, and hexadecimal literals
rules.name: prefer-numeric-literals

rules.description: disallow use of `Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call()` and prefer use of `Object.hasOwn()`
rules.name: prefer-object-has-own

rules.description: disallow using Object.assign with an object literal as the first argument and prefer the use of object spread instead.
rules.name: prefer-object-spread

rules.description: require using Error objects as Promise rejection reasons
rules.name: prefer-promise-reject-errors

rules.description: disallow use of the `RegExp` constructor in favor of regular expression literals
rules.name: prefer-regex-literals

rules.description: require rest parameters instead of `arguments`
rules.name: prefer-rest-params

rules.description: require spread operators instead of `.apply()`
rules.name: prefer-spread

rules.description: require template literals instead of string concatenation
rules.name: prefer-template

rules.description: require quotes around object literal property names
rules.name: quote-props

rules.description: enforce the consistent use of the radix argument when using `parseInt()`
rules.name: radix

rules.description: disallow async functions which have no `await` expression
rules.name: require-await

rules.description: enforce the use of `u` flag on RegExp
rules.name: require-unicode-regexp

rules.description: require generator functions to contain `yield`
rules.name: require-yield

rules.description: enforce sorted import declarations within modules
rules.name: sort-imports

rules.description: require object keys to be sorted
rules.name: sort-keys

rules.description: require variables within the same declaration block to be sorted
rules.name: sort-vars

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing after the `//` or `/*` in a comment
rules.name: spaced-comment

rules.description: require or disallow strict mode directives
rules.name: strict

rules.description: require symbol descriptions
rules.name: symbol-description

rules.description: require `var` declarations be placed at the top of their containing scope
rules.name: vars-on-top

rules.description: require or disallow "Yoda" conditions
rules.name: yoda

types.description: These rules care about how the code looks rather than how it executes:
types.name: layout

rules.description: enforce linebreaks after opening and before closing array brackets
rules.name: array-bracket-newline

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing inside array brackets
rules.name: array-bracket-spacing

rules.description: enforce line breaks after each array element
rules.name: array-element-newline

rules.description: require parentheses around arrow function arguments
rules.name: arrow-parens

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing before and after the arrow in arrow functions
rules.name: arrow-spacing

rules.description: disallow or enforce spaces inside of blocks after opening block and before closing block
rules.name: block-spacing

rules.description: enforce consistent brace style for blocks
rules.name: brace-style

rules.description: require or disallow trailing commas
rules.name: comma-dangle

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing before and after commas
rules.name: comma-spacing

rules.description: enforce consistent comma style
rules.name: comma-style

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing inside computed property brackets
rules.name: computed-property-spacing

rules.description: enforce consistent newlines before and after dots
rules.name: dot-location

rules.description: require or disallow newline at the end of files
rules.name: eol-last

rules.description: require or disallow spacing between function identifiers and their invocations
rules.name: func-call-spacing

rules.description: enforce line breaks between arguments of a function call
rules.name: function-call-argument-newline

rules.description: enforce consistent line breaks inside function parentheses
rules.name: function-paren-newline

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing around `*` operators in generator functions
rules.name: generator-star-spacing

rules.description: enforce the location of arrow function bodies
rules.name: implicit-arrow-linebreak

rules.description: enforce consistent indentation
rules.name: indent

rules.description: enforce the consistent use of either double or single quotes in JSX attributes
rules.name: jsx-quotes

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing between keys and values in object literal properties
rules.name: key-spacing

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing before and after keywords
rules.name: keyword-spacing

rules.description: enforce position of line comments
rules.name: line-comment-position

rules.description: enforce consistent linebreak style
rules.name: linebreak-style

rules.description: require empty lines around comments
rules.name: lines-around-comment

rules.description: require or disallow an empty line between class members
rules.name: lines-between-class-members

rules.description: enforce a maximum line length
rules.name: max-len

rules.description: enforce a maximum number of statements allowed per line
rules.name: max-statements-per-line

rules.description: enforce newlines between operands of ternary expressions
rules.name: multiline-ternary

rules.description: enforce or disallow parentheses when invoking a constructor with no arguments
rules.name: new-parens

rules.description: require a newline after each call in a method chain
rules.name: newline-per-chained-call

rules.description: disallow unnecessary parentheses
rules.name: no-extra-parens

rules.description: disallow mixed spaces and tabs for indentation
rules.name: no-mixed-spaces-and-tabs

rules.description: disallow multiple spaces
rules.name: no-multi-spaces

rules.description: disallow multiple empty lines
rules.name: no-multiple-empty-lines

rules.description: disallow all tabs
rules.name: no-tabs

rules.description: disallow trailing whitespace at the end of lines
rules.name: no-trailing-spaces

rules.description: disallow whitespace before properties
rules.name: no-whitespace-before-property

rules.description: enforce the location of single-line statements
rules.name: nonblock-statement-body-position

rules.description: enforce consistent line breaks after opening and before closing braces
rules.name: object-curly-newline

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing inside braces
rules.name: object-curly-spacing

rules.description: enforce placing object properties on separate lines
rules.name: object-property-newline

rules.description: enforce consistent linebreak style for operators
rules.name: operator-linebreak

rules.description: require or disallow padding within blocks
rules.name: padded-blocks

rules.description: require or disallow padding lines between statements
rules.name: padding-line-between-statements

rules.description: enforce the consistent use of either backticks, double, or single quotes
rules.name: quotes

rules.description: enforce spacing between rest and spread operators and their expressions
rules.name: rest-spread-spacing

rules.description: require or disallow semicolons instead of ASI
rules.name: semi

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing before and after semicolons
rules.name: semi-spacing

rules.description: enforce location of semicolons
rules.name: semi-style

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing before blocks
rules.name: space-before-blocks

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing before `function` definition opening parenthesis
rules.name: space-before-function-paren

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing inside parentheses
rules.name: space-in-parens

rules.description: require spacing around infix operators
rules.name: space-infix-ops

rules.description: enforce consistent spacing before or after unary operators
rules.name: space-unary-ops

rules.description: enforce spacing around colons of switch statements
rules.name: switch-colon-spacing

rules.description: require or disallow spacing around embedded expressions of template strings
rules.name: template-curly-spacing

rules.description: require or disallow spacing between template tags and their literals
rules.name: template-tag-spacing

rules.description: require or disallow Unicode byte order mark (BOM)
rules.name: unicode-bom

rules.description: require parentheses around immediate `function` invocations
rules.name: wrap-iife

rules.description: require parenthesis around regex literals
rules.name: wrap-regex

rules.description: require or disallow spacing around the `*` in `yield*` expressions
rules.name: yield-star-spacing
